short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create ZPl code from your html codes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ZPL Code Generator Extension

Transform your HTML code into Zebra Programming Language (ZPL) code effortlessly with the ZPL Code Generator Extension. Designed for developers and designers, this powerful tool allows you to convert HTML elements directly into ZPL code, streamlining the process of creating labels for Zebra printers.

Features:

Seamless Conversion: Convert HTML to ZPL code with just a few clicks.
Customizable Output: Tailor the ZPL code to meet your specific labeling requirements.
Real-time Preview: See how your ZPL code will look on the label before printing.
Easy Integration: Integrate the extension into your existing workflow with minimal setup.
Ideal for anyone who needs to create ZPL labels from web pages or HTML templates, this extension saves you time and reduces the risk of errors, allowing you to focus on perfecting your designs.

Let me know if you'd like any adjustments!
